title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 580.16 - Joint proceedings
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 580.16 - Joint proceedings

State Regulations

The agency may, by agreement with any Federal, State or
local governmental body having concurrent jurisdiction over a project or
related application, provide for joint notices and joint hearings. Joint
hearings will be held whenever possible. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
580.16

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
